Service Details: - Addresses the personal and social consequences of Parkinson’s disease through education, community outreach, scientific research, advocacy and public awareness- Offers free consultation and short-term counselling, one-to-one peer program, educational conferences and workshops for both individuals and healthcare professionals, a wide variety of informative resources, community referrals, connection to provincial support groups and access to printed and online publications
Address & Map: 890 West Pender St, #600Vancouver, BC     V6C 1J9View MapQuest Map
Print Material: A wide variety of educational materials on Parkinson's disease are available at no charge
